law.catch_line: Solid waste disposal charges for private collectors.

text.section:
Sec. 15-17.12. Solid waste disposal charges for private collectors.
Permitted private collectors operating within the County, who are required to dispose of solid waste material at County disposal sites, shall be charged as provided in this chapter.
The Board of County Commissioners shall establish by resolution a credit policy under which the Director shall extend fee charging privileges to haulers of solid waste that use solid waste management facilities.
